SurveyResponse.name: SurveyResponse
SurveyResponse.description: Represents information about a participant’s response to a survey, such as the status of the response, the participant’s location, and when the survey was completed.

CompletionDateTime.description: The date and time that the participant completed the survey.

DataMapperExecutionStatus.description: Status of all the survey data maps after a response is received. This field is available in API v49.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

InterviewGuid.description: An automatically-generated, unique ID for a saved survey response.

InterviewId.description: The ID of the FlowInterview object that’s associated with this response.

InvitationId.description: The ID of the SurveyInvitation object that’s associated with this response.

IpAddress.description: The IP address of the device the participant used to take the survey.

Language.description: The language that the participant used to complete the survey.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that another Salesforce object last referenced this SurveyResponse object.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that someone last viewed this SurveyResponse object.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the participant’s location.

Location.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates of the participant’s location.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the participant’s location.

Status.description: The status of the survey. Possible values include: NotStarted — The participant hasn't opened the survey. Started — The participant has opened the survey. Paused — The participant has paused the survey. Paused isn't available for invitations in which either OptionsAllowParticipantAccessTheirResponse or OptionsCollectAnonymousResponse is true. PartiallyCompleted — The participant has partially completed the survey. Available in API version 63.0 and later. Completed — The participant has completed the survey.

SubmitterId.description: The ID of the Salesforce user, contact, or lead who completed the survey.

SurveyId.description: The ID of the survey that the participant completed.

SurveyVersionId.description: The ID of the version of the survey that the participant completed.
